Package magellan.library.gamebinding

Class EresseaRelationFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • magellan.library.gamebinding.EresseaRelationFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RelationFactory
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AllanonRelationFactory, AtlantisRelationFactory, E3ARelationFactory
    public class EresseaRelationFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements RelationFactory
    Responsible for creating relations stemming from unit orders.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • createRelations

        @Deprecated
public java.util.List<UnitRelation> createRelations​(Unit u,
                                                    int from)
        Deprecated.
        Creates a list of com.eressea.util.Relation objects for a unit starting at order position from. Note: The parameter from is ignored by this implementation!
        Parameters:
        u - The unit
        from - The line of the unit's orders where to start. Must be > 0
        Returns:
        null
